plot: In 1926, Robert Robinson and Charles Williams overcame many barriers to become the University of Oregon's first African American athletes.
title: The Forgotten Ducks
plot_es: In 1926, Robert Robinson and Charles Williams overcame many barriers to become the University of Oregon's first African American athletes.
plot_en: In 1926, Robert Robinson and Charles Williams overcame many barriers to become the University of Oregon's first African American athletes.
